attributes.title: Ew I hate this app
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst app I have ever downloaded. I think this app should be taken down for how poorly made and inaccurate the information is. This app is inappropriate for people of all ages. Nobody should download this app. I had many troubles working this app and I had to delete it immediately. 😍thank god. My phone was about to malfunction. So I saved it’s life and my own. Please take this off the App Store. ✨🤢😹😽 NICKI MINAJ 2020!! 💋

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: Trump makes me so mad! He’s a sexist president. He doesn’t respect the female reporters. And bc TikTok blew up with what’s going on in the world, Trump is going to try and band TikTok! There are people on that app that just have it for fun and it’s going to be taken away from them! What’s happening.  Let me just say if Trump see’s this, I’m sorry but you shouldn’t take something away just bc u want to it’s not fair to your people.  Don’t make 2020 worse make it better!

attributes.title: made me lose my dog
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see what my “favorite” president was doing and as soon as I downloaded the app. Guess what? My dog ran in the room and slipped on some water I had slipped and was about to clean up and it flew into the air into my fan and I saw it become decapitated. It cost me my fan and my dog. Now I’m covered in blood as a pet fish swimming in on my walls looks at me in distress. Soo then that died as well. This app cost me 2 FREAKING ANIMALS. anyways have a good day

attributes.title: He’s got to go nobody is going to take tiktok away from me
attributes.review: He’s a racist and a rapist so great job American for choose the worst present .  Trump if you see this I wish you nothing but the worst I hope your burn you finger on every hot pan you cook with .stub your toe on ever chair or couch you sit on and smash your finger in every car door you shut . Good bye oh and your little meet and greet on Friday I bought to tickets but I can’t go because I have water my pool sorry

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: I got this app to see if there was any hope to liking Are President but in the end it took a long time to download and the app itself was slow and didn’t seem to work right like at any moment I would find my phone kicking me off the app or my phone screen freezing that’s why I say it’s one star and it seemed to be made really fast for the things that are coming up

attributes.title: I stg if y’all ban tiktok were gonna make your life hell
attributes.review: Listen just because your mad that we ruined your wittle wally doesn’t mean you can ban tiktok and if you think your stoping us you’ve got another thing coming, there are plenty mire apps, and guess what we will make your life even more of a living hell so be prepared because you can’t ban them all. And just remember, there’s more of us then their are of you. Stay mad

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if there is one little teensy Wincy reason why I should like this fat orange rat Trump....... THERE IS NOTHING. I don’t know why people vote him. And I don’t know why he’s supporting my family back to Mexico and I don’t know why he’s killing innocent Black people for no reason I would like to have one one good reason why you’re doing this why. But would I ever for is is that Trump dies Period. And I hope with all my heart that Trump sees this teehee 😘

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: This made me very confused on how to use it. It also made me re think of life a lot. If we have this president again how will we survive 2021? This also does not make any sense on why we need it! It’s just strange that I would also get glitches when I would use it. It almost gave my phone a virus! So if you don’t wanna get a phone virus I warn you to not use this app. I would also get spammed from the messages.

attributes.title: Their are to many bugs.
attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app I been having a probably on my phone like my phone is real buggy. And people keep on rating this a 5 star to make the numbers up and I think this is unfair  to the people who are actually trying to give a real opinion this app. Their trying to see past the bugs and stuff and that’s it for what I have to say.

attributes.title: All countries matter
attributes.review: I was so hyped to see the Cheeto of a mans app but when I opened it up there was a bunch of pictures of joe Biden and Cheeto boy kissing!!!! I was perfectly okay with this, just two pedos in a loving embrace. BUT WHAT I COULDNT STAND WAS THE IMAGES OF HIM AND FIONA GETTING IT ON!! He disrespected the green god and got that Cheeto man has got to go. actually this bugged me in particular as I’m anti heterosexuals. They scare me by saying things like “I like orange juice”. No but in all seriousness this man, his campaign, and his apps are all a disgrace.
